1.speaker: POLAR BEAR
1.character: クロワッサンもいけるね

2.speaker: PANDA
2.character: これに竹の葉を練りこんだら もっと　おいしくなるんじゃない？
2.definition: I think it would taste even better if they added bamboo leaves.

4.speaker: SASAKO
4.character: それより　パンダあんぱん っていうのが　あるみたいだよ
4.definition: More importantly, I hear they have a panda red bean bun, too. Really?

5.speaker: PANDA
5.definition: Hey, Mr. Penguin. Next time, could you get the panda red bean bun, too?

7.speaker: PENGUIN
7.character: 僕は　別にパンを買うためにパン屋さんに 行ってるわけじゃないんだよ！
7.definition: I'm not going to the bakery to buy pastries!

8.speaker: PENGUIN
8.character: ペン子さんを…　その…

9.speaker: PENGUIN
9.character: デートに誘いたいんだよ…
9.definition: ask Miss Penko out on a date. I know that.

10.speaker: PANDA
10.character: でも　結局　いつも　パンを 買って帰ってくるだけじゃない
10.definition: But every time you go, you just come back with lots of bread.

12.speaker: SASAKO
12.character: いっそ　告白しちゃったら どうです？
12.definition: Why not just ask her out and be done with it? B-But...

13.speaker: POLAR BEAR
13.character: 小さな１歩を恐れるときは
13.definition: When you fear taking the small step,

14.character: 大きな１歩を踏み出すときである
14.definition: it is time to take the big step.

15.speaker: POLAR BEAR
15.character: フランスの古い格言だよ

16.speaker: PENGUIN
16.character: 大きな１歩を踏み出すとき…

20.speaker: PENGUIN
20.character: 決めた！　僕は　やるよ
20.definition: I've made up my mind! I'm going to do it!

21.speaker: SASAKO
21.definition: You're going to do it? You mean...

22.speaker: PENGUIN
22.character: ペン子さんに告白する！
22.definition: I'm going to confess my love to Miss Penko.

24.speaker: PENGUIN
24.character: ごめん！　今の僕は ダジャレにつきあってる暇はないの
24.definition: Sorry! I don't have time for your puns right now!

25.speaker: PENGUIN
25.character: 早速　行ってくるよ！

28.speaker: SASAKO
28.definition: That's... heinous {\i1}(gokuaku){\i0}? Yes. But how should I do it?

31.character: さっき　思い立ったんだから
31.definition: I just thought of doing this a second ago.

33.speaker: POLAR BEAR
33.character: 例えばクジャクは羽を広げて愛の告白をするよね
33.definition: Well, for example, a peacock spreads its feathers as a show of affection.

38.speaker: POLAR BEAR
38.character: グンカンドリは赤いノド袋を膨らますらしいよ
38.definition: A frigatebird inflates his red gular pouch.

39.speaker: SASAKO
39.character: あんまり変わりませんね
39.definition: There doesn't seem to be much of a difference.

41.speaker: POLAR BEAR
41.character: リクガメは甲羅アタック 噛みつき マウントだよ
41.definition: Tortoises attack the shell, bite, and then mount. Really? Like pro wrestling?

42.speaker: SASAKO
42.character: 噛みつきは反則じゃないんですか？
42.definition: Wouldn't biting be against the rules?

43.speaker: PANDA
43.character: ワルだね　かっこいい！
43.definition: How under-handed. That's so cool! Wait, Mr. Penguin doesn't have a shell.

46.speaker: PANDA
46.character: カッパって　なんて言って 告白するの？
46.definition: What do kappas do when they confess? Hey! Help me think about this seriously! I don't know what to do anymore.

47.speaker: PENGUIN
47.character: 最悪だ　世界の終わりだ
47.definition: This is awful. It's the end of the world.

48.speaker: SASAKO
48.character: や…　やっぱり　好きです　って シンプルなのがいちばんですよ
48.definition: I think something simple like "I like you," is best.

49.speaker: PENGUIN
49.definition: Isn't that a bit overt? But then she'll know that I like her.

50.speaker: SASAKO
50.character: 告白するんじゃないんですか？
50.definition: I thought that was the idea. T-That's right.

51.speaker: PENGUIN
51.character: わかった　シンプルに頑張るよ
51.definition: Okay. I'll do my best with the simplest way.

52.speaker: POLAR BEAR
52.character: それじゃあ　行こうか

54.speaker: POLAR BEAR
54.character: 昔の武将は　こう言った

55.speaker: POLAR BEAR
55.character: １本の矢なら折れるが ３本の矢なら折れない　と
55.definition: "A single arrow may break, but three will not."

56.speaker: POLAR BEAR
56.character: え～っと… 三人寄れば　文殊の知恵
56.definition: Well then, Three heads are better than one {\i1}(sannin yoreba monju no chie){\i0}.

58.speaker: SASAKO
58.character: それじゃあ 猿知恵になっちゃうよ
58.definition: That would make it shallow cleverness {\i1}(sarujie){\i0}.

59.speaker: PENGUIN
59.character: 一人で大丈夫だから 来ないでね！
59.definition: I'll be fine on my own, so stay here! I hope everything goes well.

61.character: これ　受け取ってください

62.speaker: PENGUIN
62.character: よ～し…　言える！　言えるぞ！
62.definition: A-All right, I can do this. I can do this!

63.speaker: PENGUIN
63.character: 行くぞ…　よし　行くぞ！
63.definition: Here I go. Yes, here I go!

64.speaker: PENGUIN
64.character: す…　好きです！ これ　受け取ってください！
64.definition: I-I like you. Please, take these.

65.speaker: PENGUIN
65.definition: Got it. I-I like you, Miss Penko!

66.speaker: PENGUIN
66.character: これ　受け取ってください！
66.definition: Please, take these. I-I like you.

67.speaker: PENGUIN
67.character: 好きです これ　受け取ってください！
67.definition: I like you. Please, take these! I like you. Please, take these!

68.speaker: PANDA
68.character: あれ　何？　何かのおまじない？

69.speaker: PENGUIN
69.character: あれ　何？　何かのおまじない？
69.definition: {\a6}I like you. Please, take these! Is that some kind of magic spell?

71.character: それが 意味のない行為だとしても　幾度となく繰り返してしまう
71.definition: will repeat actions over and over, even knowing they are senseless.

73.speaker: POLAR BEAR
73.character: ううん　いずれペンギンさんが作る未来の格言
73.definition: No, it's an aphorism that Mr. Penguin will create in the future. I like you!

74.speaker: PENGUIN
74.character: やっぱり　僕に告白なんてムリなのかなぁ…
74.definition: Maybe it's impossible for me to confess.

75.speaker: PENGUIN
75.character: もし　彼女が僕の愛を受け入れてくれたら…
75.definition: If she were to accept my love...

76.speaker: PENGUIN
76.character: 嬉しいよ　ペン子さん

77.speaker: PENGUIN
77.character: 嬉しいよ　ペン子さん！

78.speaker: PENGUIN
78.character: おいしいよ　ペン子さん！

81.speaker: PENGUIN
81.character: いけない　いけない 夢の世界に浸ってしまった
81.definition: That's not good, I got lost in my dream world.

82.speaker: PENGUIN
82.character: でも 夢が現実になる可能性はある！
82.definition: But there's a possibility that my dream will become a reality.

83.speaker: PENGUIN
83.character: そのためにも頑張らなくっちゃ！
83.definition: I have to keep trying for that reason! Thank goodness, he's finally going.

85.speaker: PENGUIN
85.definition: I'm going to do it. I will!

87.speaker: PANDA
87.character: ペンギンさん　なかなか起きないね

90.speaker: PENGUIN
90.character: そうだ！ ペン子さんに告白！
90.definition: That's right! I was going to confess to Miss Penko!

91.speaker: PENGUIN
91.character: でも　今日はやっぱやめとこうかな

92.character: なんか空回りしてる感じだし…
92.definition: I feel like I'm going in circles.

93.speaker: PENGUIN
93.character: いや！　思い立ったが吉日！
93.definition: No! There's no time like the present!

94.speaker: PENGUIN
94.character: けどなぁ なんか調子悪い気もするしな…
94.definition: But then again... I don't think I'm at my best today.

95.speaker: PENGUIN
95.character: いやいや そんなこと言ってちゃダメだ！
95.definition: No! I can't keep being so negative!

99.speaker: PENGUIN
99.character: えっ！？　なんで２人ともいるの？
99.definition: What are you two doing here?!

100.speaker: PENGUIN
100.character: 来ないでって言ったのに！
100.definition: I told you not to come!

101.speaker: PANDA
101.character: 早くしてよ 僕　もう　お腹すいたよ

103.speaker: POLAR BEAR
103.definition: Are you not going to confess?

105.speaker: POLAR BEAR
105.character: 古きローマの詩人は言った
105.definition: An old Roman poet said this: "Love and good luck lies with the hero."

107.speaker: PANDA
107.character: 幸運も愛も　その勇者って人の ところにあるってことだね
107.definition: So good luck and love are at this hero person's place?

108.speaker: PANDA
108.definition: Let's go there now. I'm {\i1}going{\i0} to Miss Penko.

111.speaker: PENGUIN
111.character: …って　２人とも ついてこないで！
111.definition: Er, both of you, don't follow me!

112.speaker: PENGUIN
112.definition: I'm going to say it. I'm going to say it!

113.speaker: PENGUIN
113.character: なんで いざっていうとき邪魔するの！？
113.definition: Why do you always butt in at times like these?!

114.speaker: PANDA
114.character: パンダあんパンが気になっちゃって
114.definition: I heard about their panda-shaped red bean buns.

115.speaker: PENGUIN
115.character: わかったよ！ 買ってきてあげるよ！
115.definition: All right! I'll buy you one! So, go home! Go home, go home!

117.speaker: PANDA
117.character: 大丈夫かな？　ペンギンさん
117.definition: I wonder if he's okay. Hey!

118.speaker: PENGUIN
118.definition: I did it! I did it!

119.speaker: PANDA
119.character: おめでとう　ペンギンさん

120.speaker: SASAKO
120.character: へぇ～　じゃあ うまくいったんですね

121.speaker: PENGUIN
121.character: いやぁ　ホントまいっちゃう
121.definition: I don't know what to say.

122.speaker: SASAKO
122.character: それで　ペン子さんは何て？
122.definition: So what did Miss Penko say? You want to know?

123.speaker: SASAKO
123.character: もう　詳しく教えてくださいよ
123.definition: Come on, give us the details.

124.speaker: PENGUIN
124.character: 実はね　ペン子さん僕の顔を 覚えててくれたみたいでね
124.definition: Well, you see, Miss Penko apparently remembered me.

125.speaker: PENGUIN
125.character: 「よかったら　どうぞ」って　これ！
125.definition: She said I could have these!

126.speaker: PENGUIN
126.character: なんと　サービス券もらったの！
126.definition: She gave me these service tickets!

127.speaker: PENGUIN
127.character: ちょっと多めにって３枚も
127.definition: She said I could have extra, so she gave me three!

128.speaker: PENGUIN
128.character: ねっ　サービス券をサービスだよ！
128.definition: She gave me extra service tickets!

130.speaker: PENGUIN
130.character: それどころじゃないよ！

131.speaker: PENGUIN
131.character: なんと受け取るときにちょっと手が触れちゃったんだよ
131.definition: I sort of touched her hand when she gave me these!

132.speaker: PENGUIN
132.character: どうしよう　もう手洗わない！
132.definition: What should I do? I'm not washing my hand!

133.speaker: PENGUIN
133.character: 洗えないよ！　洗いたくないよ！
133.definition: I'm not washing my hands! I don't want to wash my hands! Um...

134.speaker: POLAR BEAR
134.character: １枚のサービス券は　サービス券だが
134.definition: One service ticket is a service ticket, but three service tickets...

135.speaker: PENGUIN
135.character: ３枚なら…　やっぱりサービス券だ
135.definition: {\a6}I don't want to use them! Don't want to use them! ...are just service tickets.

136.speaker: SASAKO
136.character: それを言っちゃダメですよ

140.speaker: PANDA
140.character: ペンギンさん　ペンギンさん　ペンギンさん
140.definition: Mr. Penguin, Mr. Penguin, Mr. Penguin!

141.speaker: PENGUIN
141.character: いつもは二回呼ぶのに今日はどうしたの？
141.definition: You usually only say my name twice, what's wrong?

143.speaker: PANDA
143.character: ペンギンさんとの退屈な時間に少しだけでも刺激が欲しかったんだよ
143.definition: I just wanted a little excitement in my boring times with you.

144.speaker: PENGUIN
144.definition: You don't hold back, do you? Let's figure out why I'm so bored when I'm with you.

145.speaker: PENGUIN
145.character: いいよ　それは　白熊君　終わって
145.definition: Let's not. Polar Bear, finish this.

146.speaker: POLAR BEAR
146.character: 次回のしろくまカフェは

147.speaker: POLAR BEAR
147.character: 30秒に縮小してお送りします
147.definition: ...will be presented in 30 seconds. How about 30 minutes?
